title: Erie Teen Accidentally Shot Hand
content:
Erie police responded to shots fired around 10 o'clock this morning at the 200 block of west 20th street. Police were told a man had been shot in the backyard.
when police arrived they interviewed the victim who was a juvenile, however, he admitted to authorities that he had accidentally shot his own hand.
The victim was treated for a small hand injury Police are not filling charges in the case.
